title: Rain, rain go away...
author: JGray
text:
We lost power earlier and there's a leak in our library so I'm gonna make this quick...

Theresa.

William.

Giant ants.

This page is made of win.

Discuss.

replies.author: Nightlyre*Guest*
replies.text: Drawing the giant ants was quite fun.  :D

replies.author: Azure*Guest*
replies.text: Wouldn't the "where no sapient would dare go" be the FIRST place "honorable knights" would look?

replies.author: Gillsing*Guest*
replies.text: I guess the danger of the Keystone of Destruction would have to be weighed against the dastardly crime of Grand Theft Ant?
